title: S74 Silks Ad Backs. 2 New. Several Sold
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: S74 Silks Ad Backs. 2 New. Several Sold
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a substantial group of S74 Silks with the original ad backs attached. All have Old Mill backs. Most of these come from a collection a dealer had stashed away for 25 years. I also want to point out that some friends of mine and I put together a tribute site for this issue , [url]www.S74silk.com[/url] . We tried to be as historically accurate as possible. Here is what is for sale. 
Bender Blue Ink 250.00
Bender Brown Ink 225.00 sold
Hauser Brown Ink 92.00 sold
Fletcher Blue Ink 110.00 sold
Parent Red Ink 95.00sold
Wilson Brown Ink. Fading and some creasing 60.00 sold

If you need back scans on the commons feel free to ask

Payment sent via paypall f/f

Thanks,

Ken
Sunday bump to mention 2 have sold. Prices dropped on several

Rick,

Cards are awesome lets figure out a deal on the Reulbach.

Ken
